 <https://eucattachment.freshservice.com/inline/attachment?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6NTIwMDIzMjM4MzEsImRvbWFpbiI6ImNoYWxob3ViZ3JvdXAtc2VydmljZWRlc2suZnJlc2hzZXJ2aWNlLmNvbSIsInR5cGUiOjF9.RBVl6JV47RVKLVieuhLRSZ7k404FEOLFKVPQU0WaLGA> 
	 
Hi Hagop Ghazarian,
 
This email is to notify you that your Chalhoub account password is set to expire in the next 3 days.  Please reset your password to ensure seamless access to your account.
 
	 
 
Account Name : Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com
Password Expiry Date : 2025-04-24T17:11:15.000Z
 
	 
Follow below steps to reset your password
 

1.	
	Access the password reset portal : Chalhoub SSPR <https://passwordreset.microsoftonline.com/> 
2.	
	Input your username as Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com.
3.	
	Enter the characters in the picture or the words in the audio.
4.	
	Select a preferred authentication system. 
5.	
	Enter the 6-digit OTP sent on your registered mobile phone number or Authenticator App or Email.
6.	
	Enter the new password and click "Finish"

chunks.text:
1.	
	Access the password reset portal : Chalhoub SSPR <https://passwordreset.microsoftonline.com/> 
2.	
	Input your username as Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com.
3.	
	Enter the characters in the picture or the words in the audio.
4.	
	Select a preferred authentication system. 
5.	
	Enter the 6-digit OTP sent on your registered mobile phone number or Authenticator App or Email.
6.	
	Enter the new password and click "Finish"

 
Note: Laptop users must remain connected to the network for 5 minutes to ensure your password synchronises across all applications. Please lock the laptop and login with new password again after 5 mins.
 
Having trouble? Please contact us via WhatsApp +971 48045755 
	 
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
 
Reference Guides:
 

*	How to reset password <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/solutions/articles/52000111832?language=en>
